title: Dragon House
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An Asian Fusion restaurant that offers a variety of vegan dishes (over 50), which include soups, salads, starters, rolls, main entrees, and soy beverages. Try the veg dumplings, veg tempura, avocado salad, tofu teriyaki. Owner is vegan-conscious. Renovated with comfortable booths.
